name: Microsoft DV-AVI Video File
summary: Learn about .DV-AVI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: Video file format created by Microsoft to handle digital video in .AVI files; stores DV video from a digital camcorder in an AVI file container; may be one of two types:
Type-1: AVI file containing one DV data stream; stores combined, or "muxed," audio and DV video in a single interleaved stream.
Type-2: AVI files containing DV video and DV audio streams; separates the interleaved data into separate streams.
